chapter.title: Configuring and Managing Cluster Resources with &hawk;2

abstract.para: &hawk; allows you to monitor and administer your Linux cluster from non-Linux machines as well. Furthermore, it is the ideal solution in case your system only provides a minimal graphical user interface.

note.title: &hawk; Versions
note.para: &productname; 12 SP1 ships with two &hawk; versions in parallel:

listitem.para: &hawk; version 1(included in RPM package: hawk). For the documentation of this &hawk; version, see .
&hawk; version 2 (included in RPM package hawk2). This version is documented in the current chapter.
